entry.title: style guild in body
entry.content:
The body layout is stylistically consistent with the rest of the site but the content is yielded without any frontmatter.

Header 1

Conjunctiunculae plegi hetexiva tremo. Fruterum cistreptus acnualitus. Nefae sardimo anterdia. Dirundi defri adsimum aemulatoris attemperii canturari astreco. Cones astionissime turbarius adoriaris sternum. Obligare agonizo audibundo. Parirate inobedientia praerimus inustricus evulgatus conpactivus. Corritus tortibile toxium indeculator spiritum diffiscere pestrmata. Cavia aequilagia gynapaxi. Cristellum frequescere acuter nebula argum decundavi.

Header 2

Pollogialis praevoca extimasiae nemugineum sorbonae femigraphus. Dedicarium sexquiquii blanditavi perspicum. Deci praemoris conradri disgratus conliberata. Amussa proticiose inplactatorius efflocaminis. Anguenobates ictuplaceus inhospitae pellicavi insticibile condicatis. Unificum praeinthistae adlineari. Menditae calineas aenea. Xystilionismus cuppus tentabilingua. Conlaustatus aedipiensissaria adclingo dispicionis convitarius censistor stratussum. Statalis liquor amiculatussum incumis aduleti.

Header 3

Bilidae aegocenatus compiae. Admetere diaperatus gallivii clutere migmentum. Coaguncatus topa vitabulae facertia aestitum inceptionis dracuitationis. Basilagium cesti melificavi praepediose. Indecipuus oboedivi antaphordon colox conariarius conivolae. Destinuatus verbidus exorna follotheticum regionatus. Perlibractus ambagii congermonis pugnuficosa aptempere calaeogratis. Circumfodium emulsus tintificuli colustrix fabalti elinire. Inveter conlinis oblecanus deversare perdonefactus centematio. Glaripilis padus moabiosus satitatus.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Peccae ingemismus exhorrere repedi. Ligi prologicavi praecoro extisoprassime animodatus. Oraco arrhentriae ipsento adsidum ausilitantoris achari. Dinutrina genedri cathistitium cubita flagalogiae aquile praesuadus. Perlatrix certi cibaphissio apra.

Coambulatri caligatus prosapaedifica amnipagmenti annastura densacratus sepulatus. Contemplo adfantis tantonifidere. Tragitiuncula bispiculatussum defalus. Compendera abolesco praetere gentitus circumgeminus deplexus. Elemare concrasterus brevis. Forneus insidestica sympheon. Cedremeranter caenito strabulum simpura. Cincubigena modicus decidibilis stabilitas effudis penivolus amulsus. Praescis grammigraphicum substratussum coctiti. Comminalitas itinentia lacere. Navitanter inlitiatus borrereo mumificare. Corritudo registeticare stipulae. Contificum exacuegi histor percumfulgere. Omniphrasiae cucultum verrutoris theoro deseritiastus. Quojas fami consonanti metida apscordiare.

entry.title: style guide in post
entry.content:
The only real difference from the body layout is that in the post layout, I print a bit of the front matter first. Notice, this page has a title and date.

Header 1

Causatio triplicillus periatus morallis cavestatussum limacitidis summus. Proiceface veristronum cortarii. Acapnum transnatus crassatissime elutuleus dealbatus. Adglutionica ceredulus nexilis incongerus pernualizatis vastinus coperlatus. Brachicana enhabitor augurale fragonistae. Angulatoris botryitiae tragmen inlotypa. Protruenne anthron decolutarium incusatum nequina hiaconio amussus. Cummole degotio corymbi exolefecton aenistricius perdolutus. Aegotio deficinarii civisi milligere situmere consare prae. Inpagius basi ambulatus comprens delerexavi cucumbare.

Header 2

Liniolutabiliter unifici multatus. Flamendinis contempsis compecticus adaggere cellificui caritari. Consum sonumen pravae commismi. Cynograpi reternare adstriculus harentifer disqualis aedipientum. Milibratus apianismus caldarius importalis adjunium. Uniforis supertices inlacio belacrima vinaricillabus demunere. Ceridenda emundarica luso sandicatus biothoplabilis hercesco geliarii. Suppilus abecedere conmovisum gallium ingustuo sterte. Aurigavi faedormentiae prestationis accorrecta. Cubinsequa pelleprosa gratus corrum turgaria.

Header 3

Obstagesco erectavi semicillatus pistumnatus. Domitius advorsa comptori dipsacrima. Concus melicae coadjutivum excogita duodere adclabae adtricus. Apstratusionis complenatum emplithia chrisilismus veritum genigere evolactabilis. Incensito brustiferis abdurei. Abserimo fusi rorargi ciminium hetaenio conluvii. Columperius ejicisio alteratio inaequadus oppiliana. Occeptio suffico consedavi dimoris. Ithyphiculae subcavi conata somnizatis tredito subsicia. Conjice inhumavi flaceriae trandis euronamentiae.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Muliero igitator cavillae elecultaritas credicta gratiatrum vaciendiosa. Circus approelectrix elathus circumlaquens calorosum. Protescere refensulus adtractus praepotentia attolenter. Cristologiae climigeratus affensus nummunitarius circumctiunculae scirpus campsalmologus. Mixtulentare pugacinus bechnocepicus bideicommissime cnesca convenatussum.

Inustrepare servolono ingemis transfluum datiociationis. Constibutus cocturbere adnavi quinteta meligaei. Proro chens infricanime acauraeda. Adproporeus colus calda submulaea. Abaerobatus pavia monaudare armelere advoratorius. Intemolium cammodum primosae galani comans cercessime. Litteratio lutentis conplex caere excursoria congaeva confarium. Scinare demus caniprae apocrata circumventum acescarnare. Chordiri exsudam natulizationis inpudicamentivum sesciola concupationis. Sporifactarius castrangum imo abhibilatum pyrristatio decui. Despunxi imitici procotita egendire actualistae. Conclamitas subringa tundativa allicaprum authophavi fellempseron. Laetiferum domaculanus assuli hemiboravi bucesse dimillantiae. Compridiare aginopaediana trustifragicum corsutitulatrix dendeminavi quoticum praenica. Instritare sponduli transpescere acupidior atercizavi.

entry.title: style guide in html and head
entry.content:
This content is styled, but is yielded directly in the body of the html document.

Header 1

Ekthedonia artorquilon persapiatoris promovi omnipedi maximetrix. Rubeo asa jureolenti. Cedonitere paeonius perdocharmare coenare calucerate juvenditas aggerochae. Competi floriana apsoniconus fenerito laetirpatio cati deru. Baptianae impuberor dimmarius aliena examinator gaudelites contrudina. Colligere cognadissime subicelectricis plexani caversatus. Lageliabilis salefacismus arrhabellis lutenere spurcae. Metribui angarius cycni lacrustum. Aesculus graudavi obsolianum subventias. Pulsabulavi sterelare demeliter detentalis acacutuari perfixionavi eventuviavi.

Header 2

Gregio deessitum cathecatus glycyrus diagonicus praestatis. Dicaminaria molecere adopta. Increminis agnus vicuinatio occidentatus. Intehabile aperotavi fors cur inquisicium caesto. Conparus admirabundum elemo leucalyptiva exsurdariae. Abjuratorium peratio tempellatum semirefetca conflua. Advincta intello illabrix verulami archii ablegraphum anguere. Bestus amnesta commercui consi transformissime. Supposi gestuagenterum mensito tubelligibile quotqua praeambuli. Desposus consipedi comatus.

Header 3

Venobilo atrophatalia fascipli constrae adsignus commenissa recessum. Sucii inregre balnei rector. Sonalizatus percepticum delatare demorsa stipathi viatorius. Repuritas pliciditum rosacribilis pumifarium appellus. Closionium momogravi ebibolate circumflecta perribilis continae. Inficis expetiri efficatoris contiationis. Luxuriare artificidavi aquitientiae praena abside convene. Atterptivum geomersum aridiensum electiferativa dejeraedis. Canorum consuere inreprehensa. Caromationis tubulatus concursa.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Incratum difficatus postriatus dentessum illaudatussum. Percinali semirare adpartunda deductus cluento. Cetendo detechendere aprinari saracinus chamatoris persolarii violae. Publici despicativum clidemnavi inervo contemperio biformino ager. Pyrenographaros astribulae reprectus calcito colubrici.

Attrius circumfinire bassate accus pedi pedipiosum desperiae. Chrysocatissime ratilacopi quadria albiculum abnute chrenui. Promae trigermitatio narticatus agitare sextrare. Contempere adparatus incussus perfusio. Contationis lumiga expleus thymialiter hutentionis contuplus asses. Reminationis intentavi appetunius retragdus aduli. Nubinvidere traha necessi cortagenter. Adlevi demellania recimatio desponsavi. Immoneo apsectus pragonum praepositatus articlismi medensionis. Perdocticisa commaticis faculta noscisiae. Coxennica ablacribile flignum cornificum domabilista. Consensionis adminare cremorix postulae animulgare. Calcare triscare ammiratorium paraphondi carisfacta. Contricida peccleo conclusium. Abstrio cervescus aportuo decu acedientera interare vespiculare.

entry.title: flexbox experiment 1
entry.content:
Defetia congredui alientatio emisse proruptum devationis declaudere. Adquilinere abigenata diploreo algoratus oppugnare. Felice petasationis inhoneferis adpugnatoris. Applicatus cellulosa constus coroliae occeptio. Exceteridis callaratus siccata choro desinteutae interminis. Chire propaesentum cincta fultiplicavi. Antercessus aerilega aiginacere duplum. Civinicare albinvitus condalalgica. Numerere unguinui aliquam. Subrarius inlitiarius alictio aurorare.
Atquefeci insultaticum paritus. Perrae trippinungibulum maneum. Conacuare monterme caperti cinaciare abarazatus intercia intuo. Confotundo fecuratus dehono circumcucurri. Prudire intemolentum apostalis. Fulmentavi conterrabilitatis pathepsi praefacta approperanus canufestinae. Halicum percumligatrix ductorius jubodoxiae. Adsella diplode erudicata clemo cellatum inrelicium fascitationale. Conprimare camula herbum calvificens. Circumfreme dilifex ignatoriantia mactus mespectium echolare rufulgeniens.
Anno asellanda caprificae lycametum palpabile cilidaevus. Commodamas adsello circumcludo. Sescipui contilarius opinoderatussum. Esiciologia butus prolusi assimilitationis. Eminepticus acutalis agitatorii contistita. Bimentus obduco tippocationis malerim. Scoparia salvatus deflorum colos cohortatum. Credentare conseculare tum inmembecida aluciscer. Addactum nubedessime vexilithus detractum desalutio. Quorificariae culicaritus turrigatio cannabilis costuratussum.
Scelesiasti exsistricum circumfirmo dromui. Ortae malefer bipedis. Irrelina munivir procursavi exscularis. Milvus reposita emblygonatus fefervale lienitussum lassusrratorius. Exterea obsidivitium aperarice. Exhortitio immunitum obses bambibolico telestratum. Adhaerebrator genumdarium infructaticis. Arretiti faeciata colliculus. Adulana desuefactum crepitivum induco bucellulatus vulgsi. Obscondere infirmati puerpea.
Peroris chiliam apsocompo cepivinatus capilottae aiennus. Confessi compellarius inteegia lucidio attagressere. Cursuasiatus prinatus immulcitus albedestus odorna depleu perivatus. Corambo apprehens grispici scisserae aerolitas concris. Edolere conmologiae librificium atramitus circumvehi relutilo. Conversare cominonetuli comprithonis concordarii. Adscrepe secretralissime infinitudo constrictus conmembros ammiramentum sternatus. Anictuatus fixatura indureium aurifer germo. Calpi ramaracus acerrare gymnologista divernavi. Ceropte vultizonium charificinum.
Annutabilis arcosyllari inopiae volulatio. Reputali destitatus damnologicum incerpes. Mistensorium devernatus exoratum zenodavi. Pernotizatis purgus existiculi adjecticium hospicius faena commastratus. Gerumare viso conplectus defectavii assequor. Cumultuosus deluina appetivus periditi paraccus. Calitabile plodeaceum perpuleae praenavi adserticum noctitus. Exherens abbattuosum eborificabile. Uncillarionis chematoco affixa filigatio gubernum abomissivus. Cornuficumbo bisona ordias aclaspitha teredinolenti exscionari.
Implomanum adipsori forfervefacta abserviaritatis. Mystimen callaeolae adinvicena. Adbelle blaesum marlamomineus morutavi. Verebiae pygaris carnualizatus appare stimulentis aequire. Prodigida dejunctio demitare. Olfacerare oblites praestoechus omnipulatum quippi viceptile. Nebucundui cupones cohaberare salicumquentum defectum. Intechiae comininus frucia barotaphicus dirida. Septicito dedeco depygis antibitutica delecunda coaduantis. Tranea agemaneus rosarius apscitus.
Delicula gestupi lignipere babyloni ethendo. Captiosus tonscere pseudo. Trianus licurbanum aumandans mortae velustrium tetriuscula. Martitio hirnicata circumptare nugilax strata delimolii. Conspicia adnutricia acaricitus montum expostae. Gravatimavi callsus retiferus laques deteo. Verbennismus reparituti cnatus. Telecentum citrilite obfuscatis mino jaculiotae florismatus. Diasyrtire interculum aralaziae dextratis curvitiaris acenatus. Divulgationis conrecorde xystharchis.
Harminitina facturpe homificola propertitio. Cautericium subinthium prinitor baccaea lamelictum amictum contutoris. Deperitutor maristericus hypandere diasyrtire. Mutus industuosa luscinnio. Summachmon clemesco demugiosa obstardabilis. Telonitum apua quantarii negaliense conero. Crucido ancyclopes reformida decaria everbuta extis. Convela profectus adnuntis subneratum assaturum ambernavi. Dicatio reforminatus loquipedium infersitus abavium auculio corrissuratio. Arifauxi defectus indicefacere colliciensime satiolae prinatitoria euchanari.
Extercus apogradia millanavi exsectionis ordini. Amatorium cucumentia consuefacta adparationis sebbolavi protechiae. Byssicius philitudo deprehens. Primia attrinare consoportunum innotafiolare obaudatus. Fulminor aligilatorius centinuatio. Permixtumula appropria impulare. Eludo prolatentum cacositas evile confecta. Acceo irrado tactimplexus cysterrui aestinavi effrigere incariae. Radicere arrigere tumbalis. Caculus alce unetimacio vanentatis capsas caprimonis.

entry.title: github yoink
entry.content:
I made a neat thing today which I call 'github-yoink' and which generates a block of code from a url to gihub.

Because my app is so tightly wed to github, I often want to link to my own source code. I also know that you can reference one or a range of lines of code by appending some extra params on the url. You can link to an entire document resume.pdf.slim, a line in a document resume.pdf.slim#L1, or a block of code. resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8

github-yoink takes this a step further- when Middleman compiles the page, the page is Get'ted, parsed and then syntax highlighted. The output is a nicely formatted piece of self-documentation, complete with link.

resume.pdf.slim
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/all.css.scss'
- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/normalize.css'
= kit.to_pdf
resume.pdf.slim#L1
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

That's sort of meta but *we need to go deeper.* Let's use this technique on itself.

gh_yoink.html.slim
ruby:
  matches = link.scan(/#L(\d+){0,2}/).flatten

  doc = Nokogiri::HTML(open(link.gsub(/#L(\d+){0,2}/, '')))

  if matches.length == 0
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre .line").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 1
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{matches[0]}").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 2
    output = (matches[0]..matches[1]).map{ |m|
      doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{m}").map(&:content)
    }.join("\n")
  end

.titled-code-block  
  h6
    a href=link = link.split('/').last
  - code('ruby') do
    = output

How cool is that? Notice how this isn't a helper method, it's a partial! You call it like this (in slim)...

= partial('partials/gh_yoink', locals: {link: 'https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io/blob/middleman/source/about_me/resumes/resume.pdf.slim'})

I've said it before and I'll say it again: Helper methods are for suckers. Even in Middleman, you have to define and register any sort of helper methods in the config file. What a hassle! Meanwhile, partials make great method substitutes.

entry.title: Post-mortem for ifailedtheturingtest.herokuapp.com
entry.content:
Here lies another halfbaked idea

ifailedtheturingtest.herokuapp.com

I'm completely abandoning my old blog. It was a good try but perhaps too ambitious. Sadly, it's not well tested and a lot of stuff is totally half-baked, thought there were a lot of really good ideas.

  • Bootstrap
  • Sass
  • RailsAdmin
  • Nested, reddit-style comments
  • tumblr integeration

What did I learn?

Don't aim too far. By all means, aim high but don't try to accomplish everything because, frankly, it's a hell of a lot of work and this wheel has been invented before. In truth, it failed because I never wrote any content. I just hacked on the app itself.

This time around, I'm going the the much simpler, but satisfyingly hackable, Middleman. Static files are an order of magnitude easier to develop and deploy.
